label: Heat from erasing info in 163
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163

# Landauer's limit: Minimum energy to erase 1 bit
# E >= kT * ln(2) per bit erased
# 163 sterile roots form information reservoir
# Erasing info in hidden sector costs heat

import math
k_B = 1.380649e-23  # Boltzmann constant
landauer_cost_per_bit = k_B * math.log(2)  # ~9.57e-24 J/K per bit
note: Heat from erasing information in 163 sterile sector; thermodynamic computation cost
